trans-unit.source:
\n

Retrieves information about a Unicode character.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx x Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This class cannot be inherited.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the numeric value associated with the specified character.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The Unicode character for which to get the numeric value.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The numeric value associated with the specified character.

-or-

-1, if the specified character is not a numeric character.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$$0$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx x xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the numeric value associated with the character at the specified index of the specified string.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index of the Unicode character for which to get the numeric value.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The numeric value associated with the character at the specified index of the specified string.

-or-

-1, if the character at the specified index of the specified string is not a numeric character.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$$0$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx x xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ns is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$x$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nindex is outside the range of valid indexes in s.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx $xx$x$$xx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the Unicode category of the specified character.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The Unicode character for which to get the Unicode category.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the Unicode category of the character at the specified index of the specified string.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index of the Unicode character for which to get the Unicode category.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ns is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$x$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nindex is outside the range of valid indexes in s.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx $xx$x$$xx$.
